languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 MP and +20% dodge until the start of their next turn.

Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用消耗性物品时，都会获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用消耗性物品时，都会获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与+20%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Используя расходный предмет, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Используя расходный предмет, персонаж получает +2 ОП и +20% к уклонению до начала своего следующего хода.
Используя расходный предмет, персонаж получает +2 ОП и +20% к уклонению до начала своего следующего хода.

languages.text: 使用者が消費対象アイテムを使用するたび、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+2と、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+20%を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が消費対象アイテムを使用するたび、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を2と、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}20％を獲得する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador use un objeto consumible, obtiene +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta que comience su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador use un objeto consumible, obtiene +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta que comience su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Verbrauchsgegenstand verwendet, erhält er bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einen Verbrauchsgegenstand verwendet, erhält er +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur utilise un objet consommable, il bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur utilise un objet consommable, il bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +20 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir sarf eşya kullandığında +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} kazanır. Bu etkiler, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek sürer.
